name: Sole Searching
description:
Originally created for the 2021 Global Game Jam.

You run the lost and found desk at the ball, and Cinderella isn't the only one missing her shoe. Can you get the shoes back to the nobles and make US minimum wage ($7.25) before the stroke of midnight?

Created By

Callen Shaw - callen.me

Nathan Hahn - nhahn.works

Steve Ritter
